t: Amazon.com : OneUp Components Aluminum Pedals, Black : Sports & Outdoors
s: I’m stoked with these pedals ... other oneup components in the future. ... They look good and the grip is awesome. They are a larger pedal than what I'm used to but I wanted a slightly larger platform for some added comfort and control. The pins are really long which makes them grip really well but I have a feeling they're going to tear up my shoes. I will likely l dial them back a bit and use some thread locker to keep them in place. I looked at many other brands but no one ...
